sentence.Network_en: Pawl is a simple device which allows a shaft to turn only one way.
sentence.Network_cn: 掣爪是一种非常简单的只让转轴往一个方向转动的装置.

sentence.Network_en: Key removable in locked position only. Spring loaded clip - in pawl.
sentence.Network_cn: 只能在锁住位置时取出钥匙, 弹簧加载的嵌入式掣子.

sentence.Network_en: Pulled pawl that can be manually into retreat knife.
sentence.Network_cn: 拉出棘爪,可以进行手动进、退刀.

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 17th cent.: perhaps from Low German and Dutch pal (related to pal 'fixed')

means.word_mean: 1. a hinged catch that fits into a notch of a ratchet to move a wheel forward or prevent it from moving backward
